commander.name: Johannes Streich
commander.notes: Predecessor: Hans Freiherr Von Funck (1 Jan - 7 Feb 1941)

panzer_i.notes: May 1941 arrival confirmed 25× Ausf. A, March likely same

panzer_ii.notes: Both Ausf. C and F confirmed in Africa 1941, breakdown not found

panzer_iii.gun_configuration: Mix of 3.7cm KwK 36 L/45 and 5cm KwK 38 L/42
panzer_iii.notes: Jentz: 'most of which were Ausf Fs and upgunned Ausf Gs'. Photo evidence confirms F, G, H all present. Exact counts NOT FOUND.

panzer_iv.notes: April replacements confirmed Ausf. E, March likely mix of D and E. Exact breakdown NOT FOUND.

panzerbefehlswagen.notes: Jentz specific: '3 kleine + 4 regular'. Command tanks with extra radios.

subordinate_units.notes: Deployed to 5. leichte Division early 1941. Equipment counts NOT FOUND in web sources.
